lines.text: MEMORANDUM
TO:
MR. R. A. PITTMAN
CC:
Mr. J. W. Groome
Ms. B. T. Uenderson
Mr. J. L. Hendricks-
FROM:
CARTER BROACH
DATE
December 6, 1973
RE:
VICEROY EXTRA MILDS Tontative National Launch Timetable
This week, topline results frond the telephone survey for VICEROY
Extra Milds will be available. Based on this information, as well
as the test market share data gunerated thus far, a decision could
be reached on the national introduction of this brand line extension.
Therefore, attached is a recommended tentative national launch
timetable. The gchedule is based on a first billing date of
April 2, 1974--three months aftrr the national introduction of
RALEIGH Extra Milds.
work stoppage on or after Aprii 1, 1o74. According to the proposed
The timetable has becn developed bearing in mind the potential
schedule, approximately the first 5 weeks of production requirements
will have bcen ruanufactured and shipped to warehouses prior to
April 1. 1974.
A consideration in determining when VICEROY Extra Milds should be
launched is the potential shortage of several ingredients involved in
the product. On the face of it, it might be thought that introducing
this brand line extension will exacerbate the shortages. However,
the 1974 manufacturing plans were developed to includo the ViCEROY
forecasted currently, already allow for the nutional introduction of
Extra Milds national launch in the Znd Quarter. Thes, the shortages
VICEROY Extra Milds.
A decision on the national launch would also affcet scheduling of major
brand promotions. Currently. plans call for KoOL to have its major
brand promotion in thu Znd Quarter of 1974. If it is decided to launch
VICEROY Extra Milds daring this period, I recommend that KOOL and
VICEROY swap pronotion periods -- VICEROY Extra Milds taking
the 2nd Quarter and KOOt. assuming the 3rd Quarter.
S
